awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Mathematical Science Computing       Research Environments
awd_abstract_narration: The Department of Mathematics and Center for Applied                      Mathematics and Statistics at the New Jersey Institute of                       Technology will purchase a graphics workstation environment at                  an estimated discounted cost of $23,000 a Silicon Graphics Indigo               with mass storage devices, and a color printer/plotter which will               be dedicated to the support of research in the mathematical                     sciences.  The equipment will be used for several projects,                     including in particular:                                                        1. Microwave heating of materials by Gregory Kriegsmann                         2. Acoustic Focalization by Michael Porter                                      3. Dynamics of Curved Detonations by Bruce Bukiet
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

inst.inst_street_address: 323 DR MARTIN LUTHER KING JR BLVD
